issue.message: Resources referenced from the manifest cannot vary by configuration (except for version qualifiers, e.g. `-v21`). Found variation in sw720dp-v13

location.message: This value will not be used

issue.message: The integer "apps_customize_widget_cell_count_x" in values-port has no declaration in the base `values` folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
